channel.title: Infinite Sums on EduGovNet.com
channel.description: Recent content in Infinite Sums on EduGovNet.com

item.title: Basic Ordinal and Cardinal Arithmetic
item.description: In this entry we cover more basic results about ordinal arithmetic. We also prove the so-called “Fundamental Theorem of Cardinal Arithmetic”, and then we finish with a short discussion about cofinality of cardinals.

item.title: The Sum of All Prime Reciprocals Is Infinite
item.description: Here we show the classic result that the sum of 1/p, where p ranges over all prime numbers, is infinite.
